description: This file contains back-end API implementations for the COSA Data Model related to MLD (Multicast Listener Discovery) on Cisco devices. It includes initialization, configuration retrieval and setting, info fetching, and group management functions, with platform-specific code paths for simulation and embedded environments.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlMldInit(ANSC_HANDLE hDml,PANSC_HANDLE phContext)
methods.description: Initializes the MLD backend, platform-specific: stub for simulation and real environments.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlMldGetCfg(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,PCOSA_DML_MLD_CFG pCfg)
methods.description: Retrieves the current MLD configuration, platform-specific implementation varies to read system states or return defaults.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlMldSetCfg(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,PCOSA_DML_MLD_CFG pCfg)
methods.description: Sets the MLD configuration, including enabling/disabling Snooping and controlling ecmh process.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlMldGetInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,PCOSA_DML_MLD_INFO pInfo)
methods.description: Fetches general MLD info, including status, by signaling the ecmh process.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaDmlMldGetGroup(ANSC_HANDLE hContext,PULONG pulCount,PCOSA_DML_MLD_GROUP pMldGroupArray)
methods.description: Retrieves current multicast group memberships from a system dump, parsing the interface and group address.
